Vulnerabilities.Title: MySQL Privilege Escalation
Vulnerabilities.Description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in MySQL server that allows authenticated users to gain elevated privileges under specific conditions.

Vulnerabilities.Title: MySQL Client Library Buffer Overflow
Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in MySQL client library that can be exploited through malformed server responses.

Vulnerabilities.Title: OpenSSL Certificate Validation
Vulnerabilities.Description: Certificate validation vulnerability in OpenSSL that may allow man-in-the-middle attacks under specific configurations.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Systemd Service Manipulation
Vulnerabilities.Description: Low impact vulnerability in systemd that allows local users to manipulate service states under certain conditions.
